dexscreener.note: Token pairs, price, volume, liquidity — no API key required

helius.note: Solana RPC — set HELIUS_API_KEY in env

jupiter.note: Solana DEX aggregator — swap quotes, routes, price impact

pumpfun.note: pump.fun token data, bonding curve state, king of the hill

birdeye.note: Solana/EVM token analytics — set BIRDEYE_API_KEY in env

solscan.note: Solana explorer API — transactions, accounts, tokens — set SOLSCAN_API_KEY

defined.note: Multi-chain token analytics — set DEFINED_API_KEY in env
